description: Sleek smartphone product showcase with futuristic neon vibes
json-prompt: {"shot": {"composition": "close-up macro shot, 85mm lens for depth, rotating table mount", "camera_motion": "slow 360-degree pan with light reflections", "frame_rate": "60fps for fluid highlights", "film_grain": "clean high-contrast digital with neon LUT"}, "subject": {"description": "premium smartphone with glossy glass body and sharp edges", "wardrobe": "N/A", "action": "rotating elegantly under spotlight"}, "scene": {"location": "dark futuristic studio with neon grid reflections", "time_of_day": "nighttime glow", "environment": "minimal, glossy surfaces, reflective floor"}, "audio": {"ambient": "subtle electronic hum, rising whoosh effects", "voice": {"tone": "bold and futuristic", "style": "confident product narration"}}, "visual_rules": {"prohibited_elements": ["distracting props", "fingerprints", "clutter"]}, "brand_integration": {"platform_name": "XPhone Pro", "visual_theme": "futuristic, clean, minimal", "color_palette": ["neon blue", "black", "chrome silver"], "logo_appearance": "subtle reflection on screen"}}

description: Talking face explainer video for a health-tech startup CEO
json-prompt: {"shot": {"composition": "medium close-up, 35mm lens, centered subject", "camera_motion": "steady with gentle push-in", "frame_rate": "30fps for natural delivery", "film_grain": "clean, natural digital tone"}, "subject": {"description": "professional young CEO, approachable smile, confident posture", "wardrobe": "casual blazer with pastel shirt", "action": "speaking directly to camera with hand gestures"}, "scene": {"location": "modern office with greenery and natural lighting", "time_of_day": "morning light through windows", "environment": "bright, welcoming, productivity-focused"}, "audio": {"ambient": "soft office background hush", "voice": {"tone": "warm, inspiring", "style": "conversational and clear"}}, "visual_rules": {"prohibited_elements": ["harsh shadows", "overexposed windows"]}, "brand_integration": {"platform_name": "Healthify AI", "visual_theme": "trustworthy, modern", "color_palette": ["mint green", "white", "light gray"], "logo_appearance": "small corner watermark"}}

description: Third-person cinematic coffee commercial with lifestyle vibes
json-prompt: {"shot": {"composition": "wide shot, 24mm lens capturing café scene", "camera_motion": "smooth dolly sideways across tables", "frame_rate": "24fps cinematic", "film_grain": "soft warm LUT for cozy tone"}, "subject": {"description": "young professional sipping coffee with joy", "wardrobe": "stylish casual wear, warm tones", "action": "slow sip with relaxed laughter"}, "scene": {"location": "urban café with warm lighting", "time_of_day": "late afternoon golden hour", "environment": "bustling but cozy with chatter"}, "audio": {"ambient": "murmur of café, clinking cups", "voice": {"tone": "gentle, inviting", "style": "cinematic narration"}}, "visual_rules": {"prohibited_elements": ["staged stiff poses", "overexposed highlights"]}, "brand_integration": {"platform_name": "Cafe Aroma", "visual_theme": "warm, lifestyle, premium", "color_palette": ["caramel brown", "cream", "golden yellow"], "logo_appearance": "appears on cup sleeve naturally"}}
